article.title: International Trade Centers in Illinois - Illinois U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the International Trade Centers in Illinois.
article.content:
Illinois International Trade Centers provide information, counseling and training to existing, new to-export companies interested in pursuing international trade opportunities.

ITC- Industrial Council ofNearwest Chicago
320 N. Damen Ave., Ste 100, Chicago, IL, 60612
Telephone: (312) 433-7656
Contact: Steve DeBretto
Email:itc@industrialcouncil.com

ITC- North Business & Industrial Council (NORBIC)
8430 West Bryn Mawr Avenue Suite 1000, Chicago, IL, 60631
Telephone: (773) 594-9292 x6807; Fax: (773)594-9416
Contact: Chad Hoffman
Email:choffman@illinoismanufacturing.org
Website:http://www.norbic.org/services/market/market2.html

ITC- College of DuPageCenter forEntrepreneurship
2525 Cabot Drive Lisle, IL, 60532
Telephone: (630) 942-3041; Fax: (630) 942-3789
Contact: Zachary Person, Program Manager
Email:personz@cod.edu
Website:http://www.cod.edu/business_resources/entrepreneurship/itc/index.aspx​​

ITC- Governor's State University
College of Business, Room 3300, 1 University Pkwy,University Park, IL, 60466-0975
Telephone: (708) 534-6976; Fax: (708) 534-1646
Contact: Mary Ma
Email:Hma@govst.edu
Website:http://www.centerpointgsu.com​

ITC- Rockford AreaEconomic Development Council
100 Park Avenue, Suite 100, Rockford, IL, 61101-1099
Telephone: (815) 969-4263; Fax: (815) 987-8129
Contact: Carrie Zethmayr
Email:Czethmayr@rockfordil.com
Website:http://www.rockfordil.com/international/itc

ITC- Bradley University
141 Jobst Hall 1501 West Bradley Avenue, Peoria, IL, 61625-0001
Telephone: (309) 677-3075; Fax: (309) 677-3386
Contact: Jim Foley
Email:itc@bradley.edu
Website:www.bradley.edu/turnercenter

ITC- Black Hawk College
4703 16th Street, Suite G, Moline, IL, 61265-7066
Telephone: (309) 764-2246; Fax: (309) 797-9344
Contact: Adrian Madunic
Email:madunica@bhc.edu
Website:www.sbdc.bhc.edu​

​
